author: Allanah Dykes
title: Pentatonix‚Äôs gender bending covers of your fave ‚ÄúLa La Land‚Äù songs are so perfect
text:
Pentatonix‚Äôs gender bending covers of your fave ‚ÄúLa La Land‚Äù songs are so perfect We‚Äôve been DYING to hear La La Land covers and the moment is finally here. Pentatonix‚Äôs medley cover of La La Land is so perfect that we just might have to go and watch the movie all over again! If you are a fan of Pentatonix and the movie La La Land , then you are in for the biggest treat. We think it‚Äôs time to grab all your friends, even if you can‚Äôt harmonize the key changes, and perform the soundtrack!
With over 14 Oscar nominations, including best original soundtrack, La La Land is the it movie of the moment. The song ‚ÄúCity of Stars‚Äù has already taken home a Golden Globe for best original song, and the movie also received best original score, so people are very excited to see what the Oscars brings the cast. So when Pentatonix decided to cover the songs we weren‚Äôt surprised at all.
Scott Hoying and Mitch Grassi, who together are called Superfruit, and fellow Pentatonix singer Kirstin Maldonado teamed up to perform a one-take medley of the songs from the movie. We especially love when Mitch tackles Emma Stone‚Äôs solo.
Clearly we are not the only ones that were super excited about this medley because their fans are freaking out on Twitter!
Lmao I love them ‚ù§Ô∏è!!! They make my heart so happy! #superfruit #PTX #Pentatonix https://t.co/uQf9MRTo9L 
‚Äî Laura ü§ì (@whyyougottaask) January 25, 2017 #LALALANDMedley is a blessing to us @SUP3RFRUIT fans. Many are getting noticed by our senpais. @mitchgrassi @scotthoying 
‚Äî Niks (@nchltrrs) January 25, 2017 @SUP3RFRUIT @mitchgrassi @scotthoying @kirstin_taylor my life in one song #queens pic.twitter.com/47idw9kmPk 
‚Äî Rachel (@baby_rachel_70) January 25, 2017 @Sup3rfruityy @SUP3RFRUIT @scotthoying @mitchgrassi We love you so much, it's disgusting.
‚Äî SUP3RJUICY (@SUP3RJUICY) January 25, 2017 Also a ton of fans received follows and their reactions are absolutely adorable!
Wish I could RT the #LALALANDMedley all over again because I am @mitchgrassi the moment @SUP3RFRUIT followed me. pic.twitter.com/k9Bxxnaqk0 
‚Äî Niks (@nchltrrs) January 25, 2017 OMG!!! Is it Christmas?! Thank you @SUP3RFRUIT ! On cloud 9!!! @scotthoying @mitchgrassi #LALALANDMedley pic.twitter.com/oURPYlvwrI 
‚Äî Misha (@mishamelnic) January 25, 2017 Yo idk if it's @scotthoying or @mitchgrassi or jesus himself on the @SUP3RFRUIT acc rn but you're trying to kill me omg ilysm pic.twitter.com/iY8i42C9S4 
‚Äî Adrienne Makayla ü¶ã (@AdrienneMakayla) January 25, 2017 SUPERFRUIT JUST FOLLOWED ME OH MY GOSH SCOTT AND MITCH THANK YOU SO MUCH @SUP3RFRUIT @scotthoying @mitchgrassi ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§ pic.twitter.com/oLUcH5GKcS 
‚Äî Elspeth Tolan (@ElspethTolan) January 25, 2017 I'm internally screaming pic.twitter.com/pFbLQX8Em0 
‚Äî mitch grassi stan (@scomche) January 25, 2017 Tears of joy my actual faves @scotthoying @mitchgrassi pic.twitter.com/D1DiPJIpyY 
‚Äî alyssa (@AlyBre13) January 25, 2017 So not only is Pentatonix making us happy with their La La Land medley, but they are making their fans super happy with their follow spree!
